metadata.title: CVE-2024-25983 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient checks in a web service made it possible to add comments tothe comments block on another user's dashboard when it was not otherwiseavailable (e.g., on their profile page).

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
